retail_miner.label: Retail Miner
retail_miner.help: e.g., mining crypto and use of a co-location provider to operate/maintain ASICs

industrial_miner.label: Industrial Miner
industrial_miner.help: e.g., mining of crypto and owning or leasing the commercial space where the operation takes place

co_location_provider.label: Co-location Provider
co_location_provider.help: e.g., maintaining/operating other crypto miners' ASICs for a fee

parent_company_info.label: Subsidiary of Another Entity?
parent_company_info.help: If "Yes", please advise the parent company, relationship description, and percentage ownership breakdown.

parent_company_info_desc.label: Please advise the parent company, relationship description, and percentage ownership breakdown.

subsidiary_info.label: Any Subsidiaries?
subsidiary_info.help: If "Yes", please advise the subsidiary company name(s), relationship description, and percentage ownership breakdown.

subsidiary_info_desc.label: Please advise the subsidiary company name(s), relationship description, and percentage ownership breakdown.

exposure_to_chemicals.label: Exposure to Flammables, Explosives, Chemicals, Oil or Gas?

has_existing_crypto_insurance.label: Existing Insurance for Cryptocurrency Mining/Hosting?
has_existing_crypto_insurance.help: If "Yes", please provide a copy of current policy and 5 years loss runs, if available.

has_existing_crypto_insurance_desc.label: Please provide a copy of current policy and 5 years loss runs, if available.

has_other_evertas_policy.label: Other Insurance With Evertas?
has_other_evertas_policy.help: If "Yes", please advise your policy number and effective dates.

has_other_evertas_policy_desc.label: Please advise your policy number and effective dates.

past_declined_coverage.label: Any Policy or Coverage Declined/Cancelled/Non-Renewed During the Prior 3 Years for any Premises or Operations?

past_declined_coverage_condition_correct.label: Condition Corrected:
past_declined_coverage_condition_correct.help: Populate only if "Condition Corrected" is selected.

abuse_discrimination_claims.label: Any Past Losses or Claims Relating to Sexual Abuse or Molestation Allegations, Discrimination or Negligent Hiring?

fraud_conviction.label: During the Last 5 Years (10 in RI), Has There Been Indictment or Conviction of Any Degree of the Crime of Fraud, Bribery, Arson or Any Other Arson-Related Crime in Connection With This or Any Other Prioperty?

unresolved_code_violations.label: Any Uncorrected Fire, Electrical, and/or Safety Code Violations?
unresolved_code_violations.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution.

bankruptcy_history.label: Has There Been a Foreclosure, Repossesion, Bankruptcy or Filing for Bankruptcy in the Last 5 Years?
bankruptcy_history.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution.

felony_or_lawsuits.label: Has There Been Any Prior Felony Conviction and/or Involvement in Business Related Lawsuits, Meditations or Arbitrations in the Past 5 Years?
felony_or_lawsuits.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution or expected date of resolution.

felony_or_lawsuits_date_of_resolution.label: Date of Resolution/Expected Date of Resolution:

has_judgments_or_liens.label: Have there been any judgments or liens in past 5 years?
has_judgments_or_liens.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution.

business_in_trust.label: Business Placed in a Trust?
business_in_trust.help: If "Yes", please advise the name of the trust.

regulatory_disputes.label: Currently Involved in Any Regulatory Dispute?
regulatory_disputes.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution or expected date of resolution.

regulatory_disputes_date_of_resolution.label: Date of Resolution/Expected Date of Resolution:

licensing_disputes.label: Currently Involved in Iny Licensing Dispute?
licensing_disputes.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution or expected date of resolution.

licensing_disputes_date_of_resolution.label: Date of Resolution/Expected Date of Resolution:

limits_of_coverage.label: Commercial General Liability Limits of Coverage:

bodily_injury_property_damage.label: Bodily Injury / Property Damage Liability ($1mm / $2mm):
bodily_injury_property_damage.help: Maximum available limits are $1,000,000 Per Occurence / $2,000,000 Aggregate

operational_1.label: Liquid Immersion cooling used for all cryptocurrency mining computers at insured location(s)?

operational_2.label: Does the hosting/co-location company have technicians/employees that are certified by the manufacturer(s)?

retail_miner_specific_question1.label: Is there a formal written safety and security policy in effect for each facility where your equipment is operational?

retail_miner_specific_question2.label: Does your hosting contract require you to insure your own equipment that is in the possession of the hosting/co-location company?

retail_miner_specific_question3.label: Do you lease your equipment to others?

industrial_miner_specific_question1.label: Any foreign operations, foreign products distributed in the USA, or USA products sold/distributed in foreign countries
industrial_miner_specific_question1.help: Industrial-Miner Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

industrial_miner_specific_question2.label: Is there a formal written safety and security policy in effect for each location listed?

industrial_miner_specific_question3.label: Have any crimes occured or been atempted at any of your locations within the last 3 years?
industrial_miner_specific_question3.help: Industrial-Miner Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

industrial_miner_specific_question4.label: Does the businesses' promotional literature make any representations about the safety or security of any location and/or premises?

industrial_miner_specific_question5.label: Any demolition, structural alterations, construction, renovation and/or remodeling projects contemplated at any of the listed locations?
industrial_miner_specific_question5.help: Industrial-Miner Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

industrial_miner_specific_question6.label: Any machinery or equipment loaned or rented to others?
industrial_miner_specific_question6.help: Industrial-Miner Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

industrial_miner_specific_question7.label: Any operations related to cryptocurrency mining sold, acquired or discontinued in the last 5 years?
industrial_miner_specific_question7.help: Industrial-Miner Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

industrial_miner_specific_question8.label: Do you have past, present or discontinued operations involve(d) with storing, treating, discharging, applying, disposing or transporting of hazardous material(s) [i.e. landfills, waste, fuel tanks, biohazardous or radioactive material, etc.]?
industrial_miner_specific_question8.help: Industrial-Miner Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

industrial_miner_specific_question9.label: Any exposure to radioactive/nuclear material?
industrial_miner_specific_question9.help: Industrial-Miner Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

industrial_miner_specific_question10.label: Do you host equipment other than your own?
industrial_miner_specific_question10.help: Industrial-Miner Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain and provide the approximate value of the non-owned equipment.

industrial_miner_specific_question11.label: Do you offer guarantees, warrranties, hold harmless agreements in any of your client or vendor contracts?
industrial_miner_specific_question11.help: Industrial-Miner Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

industrial_miner_specific_question12.label: Do you lease equipment to others?
industrial_miner_specific_question12.help: Industrial-Miner Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain and provide a sample of your leasing contract.

co_location_provider_specific_question1.label: Any foreign operations, foreign products distributed in the USA, or USA products sold/distributed in foreign countries
co_location_provider_specific_question1.help: Co-Location Provider Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

co_location_provider_specific_question2.label: Is there a formal written safety and security policy in effect for each location listed?

co_location_provider_specific_question5.help: Co-Location Provider Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

co_location_provider_specific_question6.label: Any machinery or equipment loaned or rented to others?

co_location_provider_specific_question7.label: Any operations related to cryptocurrency mining sold, acquired or discontinued in the last 5 years?

co_location_provider_specific_question8.label: Do you have past, present or discontinued operations involve(d) with storing, treating, discharging, applying, disposing or transporting of hazardous material(s) [i.e. landfills, waste, fuel tanks, biohazardous or radioactive material, etc.]?
co_location_provider_specific_question8.help: Co-Location Provider Specific Question. | If "Yes", please explain.

co_location_provider_specific_question10.label: Do you host equipment other than your own?

co_location_provider_specific_question11.label: Do you offer guarantees, warrranties, hold harmless agreements in any of your client or vendor contracts?
